===Overview===
[[File:Lizard_People_(Earth-616)_Ka-Zar_Vol_2_12_002.jpg|left|thumb]]
The '''Lizard People''' were a [[human]] sub-tribe of the [[Zebra People]], who inhabited the marsh under the orders of [[Zaurai (Earth-616)|Zaurai]] and [[Sheeas (Earth-616)|Sheeas]]. They wore reptilian armor and rode dinosaurs into battle.{{r|Ka-Zar Vol 2 #12}} 

===Events===
[[File:Lizard_People_(Earth-616)_Ka-Zar_Vol_2_12_003.jpg|thumb]]
Many returned to the tribe of the Zebra People after the death of Shee, but some may have preserved the traditions of the Lizard People. {{r|Ka-Zar Vol 2 #12|13}}
